name: Too Long of a Vacation
description:
Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+

Game Overview: You find yourself in the cold wooden cabin you've rented out for the next week. The wind howls outside and snow pelts the windows. You check you're phone and the time reads 4:27 am. You decide to...

Instructions: Click options as they appear and follow a semi-linear narrative. Playable in a browser.

Game designed by: Brandon Parks
